name: CannonSurvivor
description:
A casual game made during the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Got some ideas from Vampire Survivors.

Randomly shoot eveny around depending on the number you roll.Normally the larger the better.But sometimes larger rolls bring more enemies.

Click the mouse to shoot.

Q、W、E to use skills or upgrade.

Enemy types and ablities:

green - normal

blue - a bit faster

purple - random effects when destroyed

red - call more green ones

gold - same as its name
